comments:
The following use of the eclipse.buildScript task worked in all milestone 
releases prior to M6. In M6 the task throws a NullPointerException.

        <eclipse.buildScript
            buildDirectory=""
            elements="feature@${feature.plugin}"
            pluginPath="${feature.path}/feature.xml,${core.path},${ui.path}"
            baseLocation="${eclipse.home}"
            buildingOSGi="true"/>

This occurs both running headless and within the eclipse GUI. When run 
headless, the log file gives the following stack trace:

Looking into the problem a bit, I tried explicitly specifying a configInfo 
parameter. Any valid configInfo parameter also resulted in an NPE. The task 
worked when I specified an empty string for the configInfo. However, this 
results in invalid build.xml files being generated so it is not a viable 
workaround.

A colleague discovered bug 90231 (https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?
id=90231). The last comment in that bug indicated that adding:

archivesFormat="${archivesFormat}"

Fixes the NPE in eclipse.buildScript. Indeed it does in this case. I recommend 
that this bug be redirected against the documentation for the 
eclipse.buildScript task. Besides being very cryptic, the documentation for 
this task does not mention an archivesFormat attribute.

The attribute has been added late in M6 and I did not had time to update the doc.

The problem is caused by a missing default value in the backward compatibility
support, which is why I keep this bug open.

Fixed in HEAD.
Will open a bug for the doc.
*** Bug 91034 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 91253 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
with I20050413-0910 still seems not to work (NPE with missing archivesFormat).

Some code paths were not triggering the setup of the default values.
Fixed in HEAD.
*** Bug 92279 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fine with me if bug 92279 is a duplicate. I can see how these two are related,
but I don't agree they are identical. I don't get the NPE because I started with
M6's build-template.properties from the scripts directory.  Until
archiveFormat's default can accomodate default config of "*,*,*", this bug
(90398) shouldn't be closed.
